channel.title: Guthix Longsword
channel.description:
Title sais it all guthix longsword. Anyway here ya go.
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/guthixsword.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/guthixsword1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/guthixsword2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/guthixsword3.png[/img]

thanks, Buddy
www.buddyscape.webs.com

ya you may like that but othes like simple rember that

item.title: Guthix Longsword
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Buddy_budster, post:16, topic:293643”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=388541.msg2904503#msg2904503 date=1249713361]
Is that beter? Sorry for the cocky ness, i just have been getting alot of stress due to people constantly bickering at me.
[/quote]

ya i know what its like, but just try im not saying all the time but try posting a nice job. simply saying good job i like the detail on the handle. this could make someones day.[/quote]
Sorry, i just try to encourage something with more effort. I realise i havent posted good things to try to inspire in a while, since im a meta only person, but my computer broke about 2 weeks ago where the power plugs in. So im using my uncles, and he doesnt let me dl stuff, lol. Just take a bit more time for stuff like this, and ill be a bit more apreciative. Just in my opinion it lacks effort and detail. Try making something with disigns, not just a hilt cap.

Read full topic

item.title: Guthix Longsword
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Also, i wouldn’t align it with a guard as it could be taller that the normal player.

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:13, topic:293643”][quote author=Buddy_budster link=topic=388541.msg2904348#msg2904348 date=1249707291]

Sorry, but what was the point in making this? Its more like a shortsword. also, its in the shield hand.

does it really matter what hand i put it in. its a test person you use to align it properly. longsword shortsword, sword doesnt really matter. what do you mean whats the point of making this. its a model. its like saying whats the point in making different coloured santa hat. people still like em. oh and stop being so dang drepressive god now adays uve been really depressive. like your mom died or something. lighten up. post nice comments to someone. tell them what they did good not just the bad. people will start hating you for that.

Buddy
[/quote]

The reason i am depressive is because i have not seen real work. Also about that death thing. My uncle died tuesday at 12:15 PM, while i was holding his hand. Talking to him in the hospital bed. So please dont talk about that shit around me for a while. Just brings back some pain.[/quote]
He didn’t know, now he does (tip: put it in your signature so people will know before they post).

Read full topic

does it really matter what hand i put it in. its a test person you use to align it properly. longsword shortsword, sword doesnt really matter. what do you mean whats the point of making this. its a model. its like saying whats the point in making different coloured santa hat. people still like em. oh and stop being so dang drepressive god now adays uve been really depressive. like your mom died or something. lighten up. post nice comments to someone. tell them what they did good not just the bad. people will start hating you for that.

Buddy[/quote]

The reason i am depressive is because i have not seen real work. Also about that death thing. My uncle died tuesday at 12:15 PM, while i was holding his hand. Talking to him in the hospital bed. So please dont talk about that shit around me for a while. Just brings back some pain.

Read full topic
